class mychooser.LongPressImage(**kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: kivy.uix.behaviors.ButtonBehavior, my_kivy.behaviors.LongPressBehavior, kivy.uix.image.AsyncImage

This mixin class provides Button behavior. Please see the button behaviors module documentation for more information.

Events
on_press

Fired when the button is pressed.

on_release

Fired when the button is released (i.e. the touch/click that pressed the button goes away).

class mychooser.ScrollBox(**kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: my_kivy.behaviors.ChildrenFromDictsBehavior, kivy.uix.scrollview.ScrollView

Generates widgets dynamically from child_dicts and adds them to root_for_children.

Bindings can be applied and other functions executed by the definition of before_add_child() and after_add_child().
